# Pull Request Template (انگلیسی و فارسی)

**English:**
Please use this template when submitting a Pull Request. Make sure all relevant sections are filled out.

**فارسی:**
هنگام ارسال Pull Request لطفا بخش‌های زیر را تکمیل کنید تا بررسی سریع‌تر انجام شود.

## Description:
<!-- Briefly describe the changes and purpose of this PR -->

## Related Issues:
Closes #
<!-- Mention the related issue numbers, if any -->

## Test Instructions:
- [ ] Unit tests done
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Code works as expected

## Additional Notes:
<!-- Any extra info: known issues, dependencies, etc. -->

---
_Reviewed by core team before merging._
